 Constructor.
auto operator() ()
 A view (for an array/matrix/vector base) or a reference (for a scalar base) to the top of the stack i.e. the next element to be assigned to.
auto operator() () const
 A view (for an array/matrix/vector base) or a reference (for a scalar base) to the top of the stack i.e. the next element to be assigned to.
void operator++ ()
 Advance the stack by one.
void flush ()
 Flush the buffer to the disk. Automatically called at destruction.
void operator<< (AType const &A)
 Add a element onto the stack and advance it by one. S << A is equivalent to S() = A; ++S;.
size_t size () const
 Current size of the stack.

) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
gThe h5 group
nameThe name of the hdf5 array in the file/group where the stack will be stored
base_element_shapeThe shape of the base array of the stack.
bufsizeThe size of the buffer
Exceptions:
TheHDF5 exceptions will be caught and rethrown as TRIQS_RUNTIME_ERROR (with stackstrace, cf doc).
